law.catch_line: Director Of Urban Parks And Recreation; Residency Requirement
law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 68, Sec. 78. See 2011, 68, Sec. 221.] The division of urban parks and recreation shall be under the administrative supervision of a director, who shall be called the director of urban parks and recreation.
